abstract: Bank of America said its chief financial officer and its head of mortgages would receive less in salary for 2009, citing a review by the government’s special master for compensation.
snippet: Bank of America said its chief financial officer and its head of mortgages would receive less in salary for 2009, citing a review by the government’s special master for compensation.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America said its chief financial officer, Joe L. Price, and its head of mortgages, Barbara J. Desoer, would receive less in salary for 2009, citing a review by the government’s special master for compensation, Kenneth R. Feinberg.

headline.main: Salaries Cut for 2 Bank of America Executives
